summary: Allows you to combine your spells and get amazing results!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/upload/sagittarius22/sagittarius22_1337613378_Capture1.png.jpg[/img]
[center][img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/upload/sagittarius22/sagittarius22_1337613399_250px_MaiqtheLiar.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/upload/sagittarius22/sagittarius22_1337613415_Capture2.jpg[/img]

[size=\"5\"][font=\"Century Gothic\"][color=\"#008000\"]Still Magic... Yes, magic plus magic is still magic! But, haven\'t you ever dreamed of this: Magic + Magic =[/color][color=\"#FF0000\"] AWESOME MAGIC[/color][color=\"#008000\"]?[/color][/font][/size]
Have you ever dreamed of surprising your enemies and even your friends by combining a Restoration spell with a Destruction spell?
Now [color=\"#FF0000\"][size=\"6\"]you can[/size][/color].

[color=\"#00FF00\"][i]\"But, how can I do such a thing?\"[/i][/color]

Pretty simple, actually. All you have to do is to download and install the latest version of Skyrim Script Extender (1.5.6 or later) right [url=\"http://skse.silverlock.org/\"][size=\"6\"][color=\"#FF0000\"]HERE[/color][/size][/url]. Then, install my mod. While[color=\"#FF0000\"][size=\"5\"] ingame[/size][/color], equip two different spells from different schools and [size=\"6\"][color=\"#00FF00\"]press G[/color][/size] for one second and see the result! You will earn a temporary spell; some may be surprising, so be careful!
You can even combine a Conjuration spell and your equiped shield or your axe and see the result!
Now, okay, not all school combinations are supported [color=\"#00BFFF\"][size=\"6\"]right now[/size][/color] but it will be!

[list]
[*]Don\'t forget, [color=\"#FF0000\"][size=\"6\"]results may vary[/size][/color]! If you combine two spells, and then re-combine thise same spells, you could have a totally different result!
[*]You have to let the G key pressed in order to keep your new spell equiped! Afterwhile, it will be removed from your spell list; yes, this is temporary!
[/list]

Your [font=\"Century Gothic\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][size=\"6\"]requests[/size][/color][/font] and [font=\"Comic Sans MS\"][color=\"#FF0000\"][size=\"6\"]feedback[/size][/color][/font] are [u][color=\"#006400\"]welcome[/color][/u]
author: Sagittarius22
